Posts.Content: Bevy wrote: In 1997, I had breast cancer. At that time, I opted for implants.  This year, one of the implants deflated.  I was a good canidate for the T.R.A.M. flap proceedure so I had it done in September.  Has anyone had this last proceedure done? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: implants to T.R.A.M. flap Bevy SLH
When does the hair come back??? SisterSuewith2 Ggma
